document.full_text: general electric co  went on the defensive on thursday over a report it paid no income taxes in 2010, unapologetically saying it seeks to reduce what it owes, but expects to pay more this year.
document.title: ge defends itself in u.s. tax flare-up
lines_and_colors: general electric co  went on the defensive on thursday over a report it paid no income taxes in 2010, unapologetically saying it seeks to reduce what it owes, but expects to pay more this year.
